sys_script_fix.name: Autofill style for battery percentage

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_03eddc9183b932107f44d4abc1da1e9e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>Autofill style for battery percentage</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[// Initialize GlideRecord to insert into 'sys_ui_style'
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_style');

// Iterate from 1 to 100
for (var i = 1; i <= 100; i++) {
    // Create a new record in 'sys_ui_style'
    gr.initialize();

    // Set the 'name' field (you can customize this as needed)
    gr.name = 'x_cdltd_chargesos_charging_request';

    // Set the 'element' field (this is also customizable based on your requirements)
    gr.element = 'battery_percentage';

    // Set the 'value' field (using the current index number)
    gr.value = i;

    // Set the 'style' field based on the value of i
    if (i >= 1 && i <= 20) {
        gr.style = 'background-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-1, 255,99,71));';
    } else if (i >= 21 && i <= 79) {
        gr.style = 'background-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--warning-1, 240,230,140));';
    } else if (i >= 80 && i <= 100) {
        gr.style = 'background-color: RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-1, 144,238,144));';
    }

    // Insert the record into the table
    gr.insert();

    // Optional: Log the record being inserted for debugging
    gs.info('Inserted record for value ' + i + ': ' + gr.name);
}

// End of script
gs.info('Records inserted successfully into sys_ui_style table.');]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>emmynem</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-12 16:14:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>03eddc9183b932107f44d4abc1da1e9e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autofill style for battery percentage</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ChargeSOS" source="x_cdltd_chargesos">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ChargeSOS">d0d97bb983e132107f44d4abc1da1e09</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_03eddc9183b932107f44d4abc1da1e9e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>emmynem</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-12 16:14:32</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
